name: Stickman Part 2
description:
This is the second part of the Stickman and the sword of legends you need to find all the keys around the map and find the way out , the game closes when you find the way out.
This game was also made with some limitations because of the jam .There is no ground, so the places you go are connected by giant spider webs.
It was all made by myself, using some of my old work you can check what was already done in my previous game : https://derefepo.itch.io/stickman-and-the-sword-of-legends , I adapted some stuff and created some new features.

Software used for this project
 Unreal 4.27, Paint, Maya, Motionbuilder ,SounDraw.
